Texts.Eng: Let me see that weapon of yours! It's an old Excalibur-class shieldblade, one of only very few ever made... I could repair it for you, if you have the right materials. ^green;Bring me ^orange;12 pieces of Integrated Allosteel^reset;, and I will start reforging the blade.
That's just what I needed, thanks! I'll start working on the blade, but I need you to find some more materials before I can completely restore this weapon to its former glory.
